author: francek
title: Scam & disinformation database
description: Scams & fake news are not always quickly recognized by innocents, since they either have no time to process the onslaught of it or are naive
solution: Gather sightings & information about the scam/disinformation and present them on a website in a easy-to-understand way.
experience: I have 7 years of professional experience in full-stack web development.
